General.Name: Indonesian Paradise Property
General.Description: PT Indonesian Paradise Property Tbk develops, owns, and operates hotels and resorts in Indonesia. The company also develops shopping centers, entertainment centers, and apartments, as well as mixed-use properties. In addition, it engages in the real estate, general trading, and development businesses; and theme park or playing park activities. The company was formerly known as PT Penta Karsa Lubrindo and changed its name to PT Indonesian Paradise Property Tbk in 2004. PT Indonesian Paradise Property Tbk was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
